name: WAVE (itch)
description:
This game is an  entry for the A Game By Its Cover 2018 Jam. It's inspired by this fictional famicase: Wave.

This is  a platformer game where you must avoid the hazards and run away from the waves!

Instructions:
  • Controls: Arrow Keys
  • Avoid the rocks.

  • Run away from the waves.
  • Hold the left or right key to keep up with the lily pad.
